product_description: If you are looking for a new washing machine or planning to upgrade from your present washer-dryer, you should consider this Samsung fully automatic top-load washing machine. It features an innovative Wobble technology that efficiently washes your clothes and also prevents them from getting knotted during a wash cycle. The washing machine also comes with a Magic Filter that collects fluff, lint, and other particles from your clothes while they are being washed, keeping your laundry clean. To top it off, this washer-dryer also comes with a child lock that prevents your little ones from meddling with the settings while the machine is in operation.

The child lock function prevents the tampering of settings that virtues in before a wash program was initiated.

product_description: Get large loads of laundry thoroughly yet conveniently cleaned in the Lloyd Semi-automatic Washing Machine. Featuring five wash programs, this washing machine lets you effortlessly clean clothes crafted from different types of fabrics. This washing machine’s robust glass lids feature catchy floral prints that can blend in with your premium home decor. Furthermore, built with a powerful motor that features an F-class insulation coating, this washing machine offers long-lasting performance.

product_description: Combining efficient performance with ease of use, the Lloyd Fully Automatic Top-load Washing Machine helps save your time and effort. The Ultra Cube Pulsator creates high water turbulence to give your laundry the ideal wash. Additionally, its Ultra Drum design along with a 360° water spray helps dissolve detergent to ensure efficient cleaning. Furthermore, thanks to its Zero Pressure Wash Technology, the inlet valves of this appliance facilitate powerful washing even when with reduced water pressure.

product_highlights: Fully Automatic Top Load Washing Machines are ergonomically friendly and provide great wash quality
680 rpm  : Higher the spin speed, lower the drying time
product_name: Lloyd 7 kg Fully Automatic Top Load Grey  (LWMT70GI1)

product_description: 2 YEAR ON PRODUCT AND 5 YEAR ONLY MOTOR WARRANTY Dimensions (w x d x h)-83 cm x 49.5 cm x 106 cm BEE (Bureau of Energy Efficiency) has rated this machine with highest “5 star” rating. Consumes minimum energy and water with best wash performance Stylish & Contemporary washing machine with unique flower pattern. One of the most beautiful clutter breaking washing machine in the industry. Wash & Spin Lids comes with Damper which is Super Silent, & most convenient and safe to use F-Class insulation coating allows temperature to go up to 155 Degree centigrade which potentially increasing the life of the motor longer. N9 Additive is the first of a new generation of sliver-based antimicrobial material keeps the plastic surface safe by neutralizing harmful microbes and resisting algal formation, thereby reducing replacement and maintenance. Lloyd Washing Machines comes with Electro-Mechanical wash timer enables the machine to start the washing cycle exactly from where it had stopped after a power-cut. Strongest 5th wash program gives extra power to washing, thus resulting best possible wash performance in a semi-automatic washing machine. Two Magic filter ensures better collection of lint compared to conventional washing machines with 1 normal Net or magic filter, thus giving more hygiene wash every time.

In addition, with its digital inverter technology, this washing machine provides superior and low-noise performance along with energy efficiency.

product_details.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Outer Cabinet and Plastic Parts from the Date of Purchase will be Covered Under Warranty. This also Covers all Manufacturing Defects
product_details.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Outer Cabinet and Plastic Parts. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used according to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused By Improper Use as Determined By the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of any Nature Made in the Electrical Circuitry/or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions that Do not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightning, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centers or Purchaser's Residence

product_details.Installation Details: Standard installation of air-conditioners upto covers only: 1) Drilling of holes into a brick wall for taking out the pipes 2) Fixing a hole sleeve & Cap. 3) Fixing & Connecting indoor and outdoor units using the standard Kit provided by the manufacturer. Not covered as part of standard Installation charges are: 1) Outdoor unit stand - Rs. 750-1000. 2) Extra copper wire - Rs. 600-800 per metre (Two sized copper pipes will be used) 3) Drain pipe extension- Rs. 80- 110 per metre. 4) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 90 per metre. 5) Vinyl tape roll -Rs. 80-110 6) Dismantling/shifting of the old AC's - Rs. 700-800 7) Closing the holes with White Cement - on Actuals 8) Stabilizer 9) Plumbing and masonry work 10) Power-point/MCB fitting and any other electrical work 11) Carpentry work. 12) Core cutting fabrication and electrical. Note: we highly recommend to use standard & authorized accessories Only. In case customer arranges accessories by his own, Brand Service Engineer might refuse &/or ask for labour charges for fixing these accessories.

product_description: This Bosch fully automatic machine comes with many useful features that let you make time for other things in life. The ActiveWater Plus ensures minimal wastage of water, the DuoTronic feature of its in-built heater ensures that your clothes are perfectly dry, without damaging the fabric. It also comes with a reload function that lets you add the forgotten laundry while the machine is still washing the clothes and a child lock so that your little ones remain safe. With a waterproof touch panel a large-sized washing drum, this washing machine will ensure you have clean clothes every day.
